New Records: England reached the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup after their win against Sri Lanka
Key Match Events: Ben Stokes played a pivotal role in maintaining composure and leading England to victory
Wanindu Hasaranga and the Sri Lankan spin trio performed well to restrict England's scoring
England secured a final-over win after a tense chase
Pre-Game Insights: England needed a win to secure a place in the semi-finals
Jos Buttler highlighted Ben Stokes' ability to perform under pressure
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler praised Ben Stokes' calmness and versatility
Dawid Malan was a doubt due to injury
Adil Rashid and Mark Wood contributed to England's victory with their bowling efforts
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was significant in the context of the T20 World Cup
Sri Lanka's batting relied heavily on Wanindu Hasaranga's performance
